name: Doomsday Hero
description:
Game background

Around the world, the endless zombies are hopeless, and your only pleasure is to kill them with a variety of weapons.
This is a zombie shooting game, shooting zombies can help you relieve pressure, bring happiness.

Features

  • - Horizontal shooting, enjoy the joy of killing zombies!
  • - Fight all kinds of bosses and complete the campaign!
  • - Dozens of weapons to upgrade your use!
  • - Complete multiple tasks every day!
  • - Several featured mounts for your use!
  • - Mecha deformation for a new ability!
  • - You can choose heroes with different skills！
  • - Cool skills and items to help you better kill zombies!
  • - Snappy shooting sense!



  • The feeling of shooting freely and featured mounts.



  • Cool mecha morphing，Morphing aircraft gain flight ability to dodge zombies more effectively.



  • Enjoy the thrill of the bomb.
